title: Departamento de 2 Recamaras y 1 bano.
posting_body: ['Park 80 (fka Sandpebble Village)', 'Property Address', '4480 W Sirius Ave, ,', 'Las Vegas, NV, 89102', 'Departamento remodelados!', 'recamara grande con dos closet,Cosina con electrodomesticos color oscuro, estufa electrica, Bonito balcon, sala-comedor con extra closet, segunda recamara con closet grande, Bano en el Pasillo.', 'El descuento del mes $500.00 en el 1er mes de renta $$$$', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 2x1', '2 Bedrooms / 1 Bathrooms', '800 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$1,230.00 - $1,240.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Laundry Facility', 'Fitness Center', 'Dog Park', 'Pool', 'Playground', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets, service and support animals are welcome!', 'We allow pets up to 35 lbs.', 'full grown, max 2 pets per unit.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Thursday 8:00 A.M. - 6:00 P.M.', 'Friday - Sunday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
